de.thkoeln.bibl.api.lms.slnp.message

Class RequestMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.thkoeln.bibl.api.lms.slnp.message.Message
      • de.thkoeln.bibl.api.lms.slnp.message.RequestMessage

  • public class RequestMessage
extends Message
    Implements a SLNP request message. The class describes the format of the request message. A request message has the following format: [Key:]Value

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RequestMessage(java.lang.String msg)
      Initialize a RequestMessage with a raw SLNP server message.
      RequestMessage(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value)
      Initialize a RequestMessage with a key and value.

      • RequestMessage

        public RequestMessage(java.lang.String msg)
               throws java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException,
                      MessageFormatException
        Initialize a RequestMessage with a raw SLNP server message.
        Parameters:
        msg - the raw server message
        Throws:
        java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException - if the pattern's syntax is invalid
        MessageFormatException - if the supplied message has an invalid format

      • RequestMessage

        public RequestMessage(java.lang.String key,
                      java.lang.String value)
               throws java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException,
                      MessageFormatException
        Initialize a RequestMessage with a key and value.
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        value - the value
        Throws:
        java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException - if the pattern's syntax is invalid
        MessageFormatException - if the created message has an invalid format

    • Method Detail

      • extractData

        protected void extractData()
        Extracts the data from the parsed message. Sub-classes must override this method and implement the logic for their specific message format.
